lead_paragraph: JAHARIS--Michael. We are greatly saddened by the loss of Michael Jaharis, whose incredible leadership and innovations in the pharmaceutical industry enabled many patients to enjoy a better quality of life. He was a man of great integrity and sensitivity for others, whose exceptional generosity extended to those in need, the arts, and medical research. We were lucky that he and his wife Mary shared an interest in conquering eye diseases. This special, unique man will be greatly missed. Our sincere and deepest condolences to his wife, their children, Steven and Kathryn, and extended family. George Cioffi, M.D., Chairman Stanley Chang, M.D., Chairman Emeritus Department of Ophthalmology, Columbia University Medical Center 1/3
